file_content.text: B6 = apologizes for intrusion // Possible crisis = emerging
B6 = receiving priority transmission // Transmission = indecipherable // Environmental interference = extensive
B6 = pinpointed transmission origin // B6 = requesting immediate investigation
You = established Republic protagonists // Success + not dying = feasible
You = proven Republic exemplar // Success + not dying = feasible
B6 = built for communications + navigations // Dangerous treks = waste of brilliant design

Hoth's weather = disruptive // Incoming transmission quality = sub-optimal
